name: American West Heritage
cost: $12 general admission on select nights (ages 2 & under free). Prices vary by date/event.
description: Seasonal corn maze and fall festivities (hay rides, games, food) on AWHC's 275-acre living-history farm.

name: Cache Valley Fun Park
cost: Varies by activity (bowling, skating, laser tag, arcades). See official pricing page.
description: Large family entertainment center with bowling, roller skating, arcades, axe throwing and laser tag.

name: Logan Tabernacle
cost: Free (summer tours and many concerts are free).
description: 1891 pioneer-era meetinghouse downtown with a pipe organ; hosts community concerts and events.

name: Dee Glen Smith Spectrum
cost: Varies by event (ticketed USU games and concerts).
description: Iconic home of Utah State Aggies basketball and large campus events.

name: Utah State University
description: Walk USU's historic quad anchored by Old Main; grab ice cream at Aggie Creamery and enjoy hilltop views.

name: Zootah at Willow Park
description: Seven-acre, tree-lined community zoo with native and exotic animals, kids' events, and seasonal programs.

name: Logan Canyon - Wind Caves
address: Wind Caves Trailhead, US-89 (Logan Canyon), Logan, UT
description: A popular 3.5-mile round-trip hike to natural 'wind caves' with sweeping Cache Valley views.

name: Willow Park & Logan River
address: Willow Park Sports Complex, 500 W 700 S, Logan, UT 84321
description: Shady city park and nearby paths for picnics, playgrounds, bird-watching, and waterside strolling.
